timeline.message: added functionality for creating resource versions

timeline.bodyText: It is probably ok to remove this commented-out line... since creating a version at a given time is no longer supported.
timeline.author: awoods
awoods

replies.bodyText:
I accidently hit the button that resolved the previous your previous comment when I was trying to reply...
I commented out these lines because often the context of the original test makes it easier to understand what they're supposed to be testing, making them easier to recreate. Personally, I'd prefer to keep the commented out lines incase they proves useful when I'm working on reenabling them, but will remove them if you insist.
replies.author: pwinckles

replies.bodyText: I removed the commented out lines
replies.author: pwinckles

timeline.bodyText:
This behavior (as well as other versioning updates from this pull-request) should be reflected in the wiki documentation:
https://jira.lyrasis.org/browse/FCREPO-3242
timeline.author: awoods

timeline.bodyText: Very minor... but it seems that this import statement should be together with the above edu.wisc imports.
timeline.author: awoods

replies.bodyText: I'm usually an agrressive import organizer, but I've been fighting hard to resist my urge to organize them because my IDE (intellij) organizes them differently than they are currently (I assume eclipse's work). If people don't care about resides import reorgs, I'll fire away.
replies.author: pwinckles

timeline.message: slight improvement to the logic that determines whether or not an object session needs to be committed
